channel.title: Back to Basics (Synthbird EP 1/4) - Arimyth [Analog / Synthwave] :arimyth:
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/arimyth/back-to-basics
![Synthbird|500x500](upload://88aRacSVH0fDLZmqOGJKQw1VV3j.jpeg)
The leading single from my 4 track EP; Synthbird--a mix of synthwave, experimental, and analog house.
The EP as a whole has been in the works for months now so I hope you enjoy this and future tracks from it.
Thanks to @TC64 for his help on the artwork and the folks at KORG for musical inspiration through all that they make.
